deployment/kubernetes.description: Deploy the MLOps Platform documentation to Kubernetes.

deployment/production-setup.description: Complete production-ready deployment of the MLOps Platform.

development/contributing.title: Contributing
development/contributing.description: How to contribute to the MLOps Platform and its documentation.

development/local-setup.title: Local Development Setup
development/local-setup.description: Set up a complete development environment for the MLOps Platform.

getting-started/overview.title: Overview
getting-started/overview.description: Welcome to the MLOps Platform Documentation! This is a comprehensive guide for researchers, engineers, and operations teams working with our enterprise MLOps infrastructure.

getting-started/quick-start.title: Quick Start
getting-started/quick-start.description: Get the MLOps Platform up and running in 5 minutes!

repositories/overview.title: Repositories Overview
repositories/overview.description: The MLOps Platform consists of four main repositories, each serving a specific purpose in the ML lifecycle.

researcher-guide/best-practices.title: Best Practices
researcher-guide/best-practices.description: Professional approaches to ML research and experimentation.

researcher-guide/overview.title: Researcher Guide Overview
researcher-guide/overview.description: This guide is designed for data scientists and ML researchers working with the MLOps Platform. It covers everything you need to set up your environment, run experiments, and track your work.

researcher-guide/setup.title: Setup Guide
researcher-guide/setup.description: Get your development environment ready to run ML experiments with the MLOps Platform.

researcher-guide/tracking-experiments.title: Tracking Experiments
researcher-guide/tracking-experiments.description: Master the art of tracking, managing, and comparing your machine learning experiments.

researcher-guide/training.title: Training Guide
researcher-guide/training.description: Learn how to write, organize, and execute training code that integrates with the MLOps Platform.

tools/overview.title: Tools Overview
tools/overview.description: The MLOps Platform integrates several industry-standard tools and technologies to provide a complete ML infrastructure solution.
